title: PCT Celebrates 15 Years of a Defining Presence in Piraeus
bodyText: Marking 15 years of continuous investment and social contribution that have established Piraeus as the leading port of the Mediterranean. Piraeus Container Terminal S.A. (PCT), a subsidiary of COSCO SHIPPING Ports Limited, celebrates 15 years of dynamic and successful operations in Piraeus. Throughout this 15-year journey, PCT has become a cornerstone of Greece’s maritime and port economy,...
